FORM.SCRIPT: local BuffUI = GetUIWnd("FRM_BUFF") if not BuffUI:IsNil() then local Pos = BuffUI:GetLocation() Pos:IncY(UISelf:GetSize():GetY()) BuffUI:SetLocation(Pos) end QuestMan():SetMiniQuestState(false)
local BuffUI = GetUIWnd("FRM_BUFF") if not BuffUI:IsNil() then local Pos = BuffUI:GetLocation() Pos:IncY(-UISelf:GetSize():GetY()) BuffUI:SetLocation(Pos) end QuestMan():SetMiniQuestState(true)

for idx = 0, 6 do local Child = UISelf:GetControl("FMA_ATK_COREHEAL"..idx) if not Child:IsNil() then Child:InitMoveState() Child:SetMaxAlpha(1.0) Child:Visible(true) end local Child = UISelf:GetControl("FMA_DEF_COREHEAL"..idx) if not Child:IsNil() then Child:InitMoveState() Child:SetMaxAlpha(1.0) Child:Visible(true) end end
UISelf:SetUVIndex(1) local ImgSize = UISelf:GetImgSize() ImgSize:IncY(0) UISelf:SetImgSize(ImgSize)

FORM_MOVE_ANIMATE_WND.SCRIPT: UISelf:SetMaxAlpha(1.2 - UISelf:GetMovePercent()) if UISelf:IsMoveComplate() then --[[CloseHealEffect(UISelf:GetOwnerGuid())]] UISelf:Visible(false) end

FORM.SCRIPT: UISelf:SetUVIndex(2) local ImgSize = UISelf:GetImgSize() ImgSize:IncY(0) UISelf:SetImgSize(ImgSize)

FORM_MOVE_ANIMATE_WND.SCRIPT: UISelf:SetMaxAlpha(1.2 - UISelf:GetMovePercent()) if UISelf:IsMoveComplate() then --[[CloseHealEffect(UISelf:GetOwnerGuid())]] UISelf:Visible(false) end
UISelf:SetMaxAlpha(1.2 - UISelf:GetMovePercent()) if UISelf:IsMoveComplate() then UISelf:Close() end

FORM.SCRIPT: local kRank = UISelf:GetControl("IMG_RANK") if false == kRank:IsNil() then local iBuildIndex = UISelf:GetBuildIndex() if (iBuildIndex % 2) ~= 0 then iBuildIndex = iBuildIndex+1 end local iRank = iBuildIndex / 2 kRank:SetUVIndex( iRank ) end

local kRank = UISelf:GetControl("FRM_RANK") if false == kRank:IsNil() then local iBuildIndex = UISelf:GetBuildIndex() if (iBuildIndex % 2) ~= 0 then iBuildIndex = iBuildIndex+1 end local iRank = iBuildIndex / 2 kRank:SetStaticText( iRank ) end
CallUI("FRM_EM_LOCATION_REBIRTHTIME") GetEventTimer():Add("EM_SELECT_LOCATION", 9.5, "RandomMoveBattleArea()", 1, false) --[[Move 10 Second Time Before]]
local BuffUI = GetUIWnd("FRM_BUFF") if not BuffUI:IsNil() then local Pos = BuffUI:GetLocation() Pos:IncY(UISelf:GetSize():GetY()) BuffUI:SetLocation(Pos) end QuestMan():SetMiniQuestState(false)
local BuffUI = GetUIWnd("FRM_BUFF") if not BuffUI:IsNil() then local Pos = BuffUI:GetLocation() Pos:IncY(-UISelf:GetSize():GetY()) BuffUI:SetLocation(Pos) end QuestMan():SetMiniQuestState(true)
local UIHotkey = UISelf:GetControl("FRM_HOTKEY") if not UIHotkey:IsNil() then UIHotkey:SetUVIndex(UISelf:GetBuildIndex()) end
local iValue = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() if iValue > 0 then iValue = iValue - 1 UISelf:SetStaticText( string.format(GetTextW(74007):GetStr(), iValue ) ) UISelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(iValue) end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local packet = NewPacket(8244) Net_Send(packet) DeletePacket(packet) return true
